Title: The Finance Commission and public finance in Kerala
Summary:
Over the years, the share of Union Finance Commission tax transfers has declined for a few States, including Kerala.
If we look at the numbers, the inter se State share of Kerala in the Finance Commission transfers (which was 2.341% in the Thirteenth Finance Commission, and which increased to 2.5% in the Fourteenth Finance Commission) declined to 1.925% in the Fifteenth Finance Commission.
The weightage given to the distance of per capita income in the Finance Commission tax transfer formula adversely affects growing States, including Kerala.
Lekha Chakraborty is Professor at the National Institute of Public Finance and Policy (NIPFP) and Member, Board of Management of the International Institute of Public Finance (IIPF), Munich).
Balamuraly B. is a former researcher at the National Institute of Public Finance and Policy

TRA’s Brand Trust Report, the 13th in its series, is a result of primary research conducted with 2,500 consumer-influencers across 16 cities.
1 Most Trusted Financial Services Brand for the 8th consecutive year since 2016.
Muthoot Finance is India’s largest gold loan NBFC and India’s No.1 Most Trusted Financial Services Brand from the last eight years, according to the Brand Trusted Report .

Title: Financial changes effective April 1: What you need to know
Summary:
Follow us on Image Source : INDIA TV Financial changes effective April 1: What you need to knowAs the curtains draw on the financial year 2023–24, the dawn of the new fiscal year heralds a slew of financial alterations set to come into effect from April 1.
Effective April 1, NPS account holders will need to undergo two-factor authentication, bolstering system security.
Effective April 1, EPFO account holders will no longer need to initiate transfer requests, simplifying the process of managing Provident Fund (PF) balances during job changes.
Effective April 1, users will be subject to the revised wallet load restrictions, marking a strategic overhaul of Ola Money’s operational framework.

Title: Finance Minister Sitharaman praises RBI’s economic management amidst challenges
Summary:
Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman commended the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) deft handling of economy amidst global challenges and professional stewardship of the Central Bank.
Speaking on the occasion of the RBI’s 90th anniversary, the Finance Minister praised its efforts in improving the balance sheet challenges confronting banks.
Sitharaman underscored the RBI’s adeptness in inflation management, noting its success in stabilising government bond (G-secs) yields despite pressures for monetary tightening.
Reflecting on the past, Sitharaman recalled India’s banking landscape a decade ago marred by balance sheet woes.
Today, she asserted, the nation enjoys a “balance sheet advantage” as a result of the collaborative endeavours of the government and the RBI.

Title: PSBs level up, need good hands at top: FM Sitharaman
Summary:
The government has already split the role of chairman and managing director in public sector banks (PSBs) into a non-executive chairman, and a managing director and chief executive officer.
That apart, following several amalgamations, India now has 12 public sector banks.
Asked about the trends in private capex, the minister said the private sector is investing significantly in areas offering new opportunities.
India witnessed a GDP growth of 7.8% in Q1, 7.6% in Q2 and 8.4% in Q3 of 2023-24.
Several institutions have raised their GDP growth forecasts for India after the Q3 growth number of 8.4% exceeded expectations.

Title: Stable, strong financial system to act as bedrock for economic progress: RBI Governor
Summary:
Mumbai , Reserve Bank Governor Shaktikanta Das on Monday said the endeavour of the central bank would be to provide a stable and strong financial system over the next decade, which will act as the bedrock for the country's economic progress.
Over the years, the Reserve Bank of India ( RBI ) has emerged as a symbol of stability, resilience and commitment to the welfare of our citizens, he said at an event to mark the 90th anniversary of the RBI.
"As we move towards RBI at 100, the Reserve Bank remains focussed on a stable and strong financial system that would act as the bedrock for our country's economic progress," he said.
"We are a full-service central bank with our functions spanning multiple dimensions.
It has been our endeavour to promote a financial sector that is robust, resilient, and future-ready," he said.

Title: Finance Ministry clarifies: No changes in new tax regime, issues 6-point note
Summary:
Follow us on Image Source : INDIA TV Finance Ministry clarifies: No changes in new tax regime, issues 6-point noteAmidst speculations, the Finance Ministry has clarified that there will be no new changes in the tax regime from April 1, 2024, as the interim budget’s income tax proposals take effect.
Introduction of new tax regime: The new tax regime under Section 115BAC(1A) was introduced in the Finance Act 2023, differing from the existing old regime.
Lower tax rates: While the new tax regime offers significantly lower tax rates, it does not provide the benefit of various exemptions and deductions available in the old regime.
Opt-out option: Taxpayers have the option to opt out of the new tax regime until filing their returns for AY 2024–25.
Interim budget tax slabsAs per the interim budget, the income tax slabs remain unchanged for the new financial year (FY2024–25).

Title: Ministry of Finance debunks falsehoods: New tax regime clarified, no changes on horizon
Summary:
(You can now subscribe to our(You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channelNew Delhi: In response to widespread misinformation circulating on various social media platforms, the Ministry of Finance issued a clarification regarding the applicability of the new tax regime versus the existing one.The statement, posted on X, addressed misconceptions surrounding changes purportedly taking effect from April 1, 2024.Ministry of Finance posted, "Ministry of Finance posted on X, "It has come to notice that misleading information related to new tax regime is being spread on some social media platforms.
It is therefore clarified that: There is no new change which is coming in from 01.04.2024....."https://twitter.com/finminindia/status/1774504330499879372?s=48&t=CSE0glwGSDCXRHUtG7cLjwThe Ministry categorically stated that there are no new alterations slated for implementation on April 1, 2024.Instead, it underscored that the new tax regime under section 115BAC(1A) was introduced in the Finance Act 2023.This regime, as compared to the existing one, presents different tax brackets and provisions.The new tax regime, denoted under section 115BAC(1A), is applicable for individuals other than companies and firms.It serves as the default regime starting from the financial year 2023-24, with the corresponding assessment year being AY 2024-25.Under the new tax regime, tax rates are notably lower than those in the existing regime.However, it's important to note that various exemptions and deductions , excluding the standard deduction of Rs.
50,000 from salary and Rs.
15,000 from family pension, are not available.
Taxpayers retain the autonomy to select the tax regime they deem most advantageous to their financial situation.They can opt for either the old or new tax regime.

Title: India's finance ministry clears confusion on new tax regime. Here's its six-point sum-up
Summary:
In a post on X, the finance ministry cleared all the confusion over the new tax regime.
What did the finance ministry clarify on the new tax regime?
New tax regime is the default tax regime, however, tax payers can choose the tax regime (old or new) that they think is beneficial to them.
Option for opting out from the new tax regime is available till filing of return for the AY 2024-25.
So, they can choose new tax regime in one financial year and old tax regime in another year and vice versa."

Title: Rs 26,000 crore disbursed from treasury in March: Kerala Finance minister
Summary:
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM : The state treasury has disbursed Rs 26,000 crore in March, the last month of this financial year, as compared to Rs 22,000 crore during the same period last year, Finance Minister K N Balagopal has said.
He said the salary and pension were disbursed promptly, while the loan repayment was also done on time.
“We are expecting a favourable interim order from the Apex Court on the petition filed against the Centre blocking the grant that the state is entitled to.
Then we can ensure more financial support for various sectors,” he said.
He said that there has been an increase in the revenue generated by the state.

Title: 'My Secretaries Don't Listen To Me', Says Delhi Govt; Supreme Court Issues Notice To Delhi Finance Secretary On GNCTD Plea Over DJB Funds
Summary:
The Supreme Court on Monday (April 1) issued notice to the Delhi Finance Secretary on a petition filed by the Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi (GNCTD) seeking the release of the funds approved by the Delhi Assembly for the Delhi Jal Board.
A bench comprising Chief Justice of India DY Chandrachud, Justice JB Pardiwala and Justice Manoj Misra said that the response of the Finance Secretary will be sought.
Rohatgi submitted that the funds are to be released by the Finance Department which is under the Delhi Government itself.
"They listen only to the LG," Singhvi added.
"We will ask the Finance Secretary..," CJI said while adding that the LG can be deleted from the array of respondents.

Title: SC seeks reply of Delhi finance secretary on plea of AAP govt alleging non-release of DJB funds
Summary:
A bench headed by Chief Justice D Y Chandrachud did not issue notice to the office of Delhi Lieutenant Governor after taking note of the submissions of senior advocate Mukul Rohatgi.
(File photo)The Supreme Court on Monday issued a notice to Delhi’s Principal Secretary (Finance) on a plea of the AAP government alleging that the official was not releasing funds meant for the Delhi Jal Board.
A bench headed by Chief Justice D Y Chandrachud did not issue notice to the office of Delhi Lieutenant Governor after taking note of the submissions of senior advocate Mukul Rohatgi that the LG has no role in the disbursal of funds by the finance department of the Delhi government.

Title: SC issues notice to Principal Secretary-Finance on allegations of non-release of funds for Delhi Jal Board
Summary:
Follow us on Image Source : REPRESENTATIVE IMAGE Supreme CourtThe Supreme Court on Monday issued a notice to the Principal Secretary (Finance) on plea of AAP govt alleging non-release of funds meant for Delhi Jal Board.
The bench, also comprising justices JB Pardiwala and Manoj Misra, has now posted the matter for hearing on April 5.
The CJI had assured the AAP government that it can always order the release of Rs 3,000 crore funds meant for the Delhi Jal Board even after they lapse on March 31.
Earlier, the Enforcement Directorate made a startling allegation, claiming that funds derived from alleged corruption within a Delhi Jal Board (DJB) contract were 'passed on' as election funds to the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP).

Title: PNB Housing Finance zooms 8% as Morgan Stanley stays bullish, sets target at Rs 970
Summary:
In the last one year, PNB Housing Finance stock has rallied more than 50 percent, outperforming Nifty 50 which has risen around 30 percent during this period.
Shares of PNB Housing Finance zoomed over 8 percent on April 1 after Morgan Stanley put an 'overweight' rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 970 per share.
The upgrade is also supported by the housing finance company's strengthened capital position and diversified resource profile.
The fourth quarter typically sees strong performance for housing finance companies due to loan growth and improved asset quality, noted Morgan Stanley.

Title: Pocket FM Looks to Create — and Own — a New Digital Entertainment Category
Summary:
If Pocket FM gets its way, there will be a new streaming category to obsess about: Binge-listening to audio series.
“I think we’ve stumbled on a new entertainment category,” Pocket FM CEO Rohan Nayak told PYMNTS.
We’re finding our own way.”This new category that Nayak wants to create — audio series and serialized audio fiction — is different than podcasts.
Pocket FM is trying to own the OTT storytelling space, and it has new funding and a unique payment model to support that effort.
However, its application doesn’t stop there; Pocket FM is exploring AI’s capacity to predict potential blockbusters, aiming to identify future hits among a plethora of productions.

Title: Zee Entertainment lays off 50% employees at Bengaluru's tech unit
Summary:
Zee Entertainment Enterprises has laid off 50 per cent of its staff at its Technology & Innovation Centre (TIC), Bengaluru in order to optimise its resources, the company said in a statement.
The company did not disclose the number of employees at the Centre who were laid off.
The plan will optimise the resources and arrive at a cost-effective structure to drive continued growth for the company, it said.
In January this year, Japan's Sony Corporation called off the merger of its India unit with Zee Entertainment which would have created a $10 billion media giant in the country.
The company recently announced the strategic realignment of its revenue vertical, which is now being directly driven by Goenka.

Shreya Entertainment and Productions have released several successful songs in the past six months, including tracks from albums like “Beqarar”, “Koshish”, and “Baaton Mein”.

Title: 'Queen of Tears' reigns as the most buzzworthy drama and leads the actor rankings for third consecutive week
Summary:
Kim Ji Won (“Queen of Tears”) Kim Soo Hyun (“Queen of Tears”) Cha Eun Woo (“Wonderful World”) Jeon Jong Seo (“Wedding Impossible”) Moon Sang Min (“Wedding Impossible”) Ahn Bo Hyun (“Flex x Cop”) Jang Da Ah (“Pyramid Game”) Kim Nam Joo (“Wonderful World”) Kim Ha Neul (“Nothing Uncovered”) Bona (“Pyramid Game”)‘ Queen of Tears ’ continues to attract popularity and has peaked the buzzworthy game yet again!
In the latest rankings by Good Data Corporation, tvN's ‘Queen of Tears’ maintained its stronghold as the most buzzworthy drama for the third consecutive week.

Title: Aadujeevitham's budget revealed: Director Blessy confirms massive Rs 82 crore investment
Summary:
From Salaar to The Goat Life: Prithviraj Sukumaran talks about his transformation for Najeeb and how the character impacted him personallyDirector Blessy has officially disclosed the staggering budget of the recently released survival drama, ' Aadujeevitham ,' confirming earlier speculations.In an interview with SS Music, Blessy revealed that the Prithviraj Sukumaran starrer has been mounted on a whopping budget of Rs 82 crore, surpassing previous estimates.While initial reports suggested a budget of Rs 80 crore, Blessy's confirmation sheds light on the ambitious scale of the project.Despite the substantial investment, 'Aadujeevitham' has shown promising returns within just four days of its release, grossing over Rs 65 crore worldwide.Expressing confidence in the film's potential to be accepted by audiences across languages, Blessy explained in the interview that the decision to allocate such a significant budget stemmed from the team's belief in the story's universal appeal.Amidst its impressive box office performance, 'Aadujeevitham' has garnered widespread acclaim, with audiences lauding its gripping narrative and Prithviraj Sukumaran's compelling portrayal.According to the Sacnilk website, domestically, the film has collected approximately Rs 34 crores, while overseas earnings exceed 3.6 million, according to early estimates.
'Aadujeevitham', starring Prithviraj Sukumaran in the lead as the character Najeeb , hit the big screens on March 28.
The movie is receiving magnificent reviews from fans and celebrities who are calling it a masterpiece.

Title: Vignesh Shivan's directorial 'LIC' teaser to be unveiled on Tamil New Year
Summary:
Vignesh Shivan 's directorial venture, 'Love Insurance Corporation' (LIC), is set to generate anticipation with the release of its teaser on Tamil New Year , April 14.
Collaborating with Pradeep Ranganathan , the filming of this project has proceeded smoothly, with a recent schedule concluding in Singapore.However, there's a twist to the tale.
A report from Indiaglitz Tamil indicates that a complaint has been lodged against Vignesh Shivan, challenging his right to use the title 'Love Insurance Corporation'.This legal development leaves uncertainty regarding the film's title.Starring Pradeep Ranganathan and Krithi Shetty in lead roles, and featuring SJ Suryah in a pivotal character, 'LIC' was initially set to include Nayanthara in a significant role, marking her third collaboration with director Vignesh Shivan.
However, her involvement has been curtailed, and the replacement remains undisclosed.

Title: Jeethu Joseph lauds ‘Aadujeevitham’, calls it a 'masterpiece'
Summary:
Prithviraj Sukumaran's 'Aadujeevitham' gets leaked online; director files complaint with cyber cellJai Ganesh - Official TrailerThe latest Malayalam release ‘ Aadujeevitham ’ continues to conquer hearts, and the latest celebrity to heap praise is acclaimed filmmaker Jeethu Joseph.
Jeethu Joseph , best known for his celebrated ‘Drishyam’ franchise, watched ‘Aadujeevitham’ on its second day of release, and he was blown away!In a note shared on Friday night, March 29, Jeethu Joseph called the film a 'masterpiece’ and also lauded the entire team for delivering the cinematic marvel.Jeethu Joseph took to his social media handle and wrote, “Just watched The Goat Life!
Congratulations to the whole team!”Jeethu Joseph also observed that Malayalam cinema is off to a great start in 2024: “What a fantastic year for Malayalam cinema!”Check out the post here.Directed by Blessy, ‘Aadujeevitham’ is based on the eponymous best-selling novel by Benyamin.
The film is receiving rave reviews from critics and cinephiles alike.
‘Aadujeevitham’ is running successfully in theaters across the globe.

Title: Angana Roy and Rohaan Bhattacharjee turn up the heat at an awards night and pose together on the red carpet
Summary:
Actress Angana Roy and actor Rohaan Bhattacharjee have been fueling the romance speculation, one red carpet appearance at a time.
The ‘ Tumi Ase Pase Thakle ’ duo have frequently been spotted in each other’s company before.
But this time, the rumored couple chose to turn up the heat on the red carpet of an award night.
The actor also shares his and Angana’s photos on social media with mushy captions.Rohaan was once dating actress Srijla Guha .
On the work front, Rohaan is now seen sharing the screen in ‘Tumi Ase Pase Thakle’ with Angana.

Title: 'Varshangalkku Shesham’ to ‘Aavesham’: An Exciting Lineup of Malayalam Movies to Look Forward to
Summary:
Varshangalkku Shesham - Official TrailerAfter an underwhelming year, the Malayalam film industry has made its terrific comeback in the first half of 2024 with the release of several blockbuster films, from 'Bramayugam' to 'Aadujeevitham'.
Blended with comedic elements and inspired by real-life events, 'Aavesham' is set to entertain audiences when it releases in theaters on April 11.Following closely is 'Nadikar,' featuring Tovino Thomas and Soubin Shahir in prominent roles.
Directed by Jean Paul Lal (Lal Jr.), the film delves into the life of superstar David Padikkal, exploring his journey to self-discovery amidst the glitz and glamour of the film industry.
The film follows the journey of Ganesh Gangadharan, a paraplegic graphic designer unraveling a web of mysteries while navigating his own challenges.
The movie is expected to be a perfect mix of a superhero theme with a crime thriller genre.Vineeth Sreenivasan's directorial venture, 'Varshangalkku Shesham,' is another highly anticipated release slated for April 11.

Title: Shedding light on the ‘Sita Haran’ track in ‘Shrimad Ramayan,’ Nikitin Dheer talks about how he prepared to play a Sage, says 'I tried to embody the character by keeping myself calm'
Summary:
Nikitin Dheer looks back at Chennai Express: Rohit Shetty promised my scenes won't be deleted!
TV's iconic saga, ‘ Shrimad Ramayan ’ has captured the hearts of viewers with the timeless narrative of Lord Ram’s life and teachings.
So far viewers witnessed how the demon King Ravan abducts Mata Sita and, in an attempt to save and protect her, Jatayu fights with Ravan to rescue Mata Sita.
It did take some preparation when I had to don the look of a sage who is the exact opposite of Ravan.
From toning down the intensity to donning a demure look to convince Mata Sita.

Title: 'Thalaivar 171': Will Rajinikanth play a GOLD smuggler in Lokesh Kanagaraj's directorial?
Summary:
Rajinikanth's collaboration with Lokesh Kanagaraj has garnered significant attention, with their upcoming film tentatively titled ' Thalaivar 171 ' becoming a hot topic online since its first look launch.
Regular reports speculating various aspects of the film have surfaced, suggesting that Rajinikanth will portray a negative character in this action-packed drama .Adding to the intrigue, recent buzz on social media hints that Rajinikanth's character might be a gold smuggler in 'Thalaivar 171'.Following a decision to steer clear of drug-related themes, Lokesh Kanagaraj reportedly crafted a storyline centered around smuggling , offering a fresh and uncommon subject for Rajinikanth.
Notably, Rajinikanth has previously essayed roles as a smuggler in hits like ' Billa ' and ' Thee ', promising audiences a rekindling of that magic in his collaboration with Lokesh Kanagaraj.The official title of 'Thalaivar 171' is scheduled to be unveiled on April 22, with reports suggesting it could be either ' Kazhugu ' or 'Thalapathy'.
Fans are eagerly awaiting this announcement, anticipating the release of a motion poster or teaser to accompany it.
Production for 'Thalaivar 171' is slated to commence in June, with plans for a rapid shooting schedule for this high-budget spectacle.

Title: Soorya Krishnamoorthy lauds ‘Aadujeevitham’
Summary:
Writer-director Soorya Krishnamoorthy is all praise for the latest Malayalam release, ‘ Aadujeevitham ’ directed by Blessy , featuring Prithviraj Sukumaran in the lead role.
He also stated that sound designer Resul Pookutty and cinematographer Sunil KS are the unsung heroes of ‘Aadujeevitham’.Resul Pookutty shared the note on social media.
AADU JEEVITHAM, the masterpiece film by BLESSY, is truly a milestone film in world cinema.
Blessy has succeeded in making the impossible possible by creating this world-class cinema in the small state of Kerala.
Sunil Their contributions can be described only in the superlative They are the unsung heroes of the film.”Soorya Krishnamoorthy further applauded Prithviraj Sukumaran: “Prithviraj Sukumaran is surely at his best in this film... What a dedication, what a sacrifice, and what a commitment!

Title: Bigg Boss Malayalam 6 preview: Yamuna lashes out at power team, says 'I am not your maid'
Summary:
As tensions continue to escalate within the Bigg Boss Malayalam 6 house, the upcoming episode promises to deliver a fiery confrontation between contestant Yamuna and the power team, comprised of Arjun and Resmin .
In a teaser previewing the episode, viewers catch a glimpse of Yamuna expressing her frustration and discontent with the power team's directives and demeanor.The teaser opens with Yamuna vehemently lashing out at Arjun and Resmin.In a bold declaration, she asserts, "I am not anyone's maid," highlighting her refusal to be treated as a mere servant by the power team.
Further, Yamuna dismisses their actions as mere "child's play".As the confrontation escalates, Arjun and Resmin suggest that Yamuna should leave if she cannot handle the responsibilities assigned to her.
However, Yamuna stands her ground, rebuffing their attempts to dictate her actions and decisions.The teaser leaves viewers on the edge of their seats, eagerly anticipating the outcome of the heated exchange between Yamuna and the power team.
As the drama unfolds, viewers can expect twists, turns, and unexpected revelations to keep them hooked to their screens, eagerly awaiting the next chapter in the gripping saga of Bigg Boss Malayalam 6.

Title: Saranya Ponvannan's neighbour files a police complaint against the actress
Summary:
Saranya Ponvannan , the veteran actress , is popular for her versatile roles, and she is fondly called the mother of Kollywood as she acted as a mother for most of the current generation of actors.
Reportedly, a police complaint has been filed against Saranya Ponvannan.Saranya Ponvannan , the actress and wife of actor Ponvannan, is living with her family at her residence in Virugambakkam, Chennai.According to a report from Indiaglitz Tamil, Saranya Ponvannan has been involved in a fight with her neighbor over the parking area.
Things heated up, and Saranya Ponvannan is said to have threatened to kill Sridevi, the woman next door.
Sridevi has reportedly attached the CCTV visuals of Saranya Ponvannan fighting as evidence of the complaint.Saranya Ponvannan, the actress, who is popular for her kind roles in movies, being involved in a fight with her neighbor has shocked fans.
Now, it's a 'parking' moment for Saranya Ponvannan, who faces the same problem in real life.

Title: Saanya Iyer takes a sweet trip down memory lane; relishes Haalkova from a petty shop
Summary:
In a heartwarming Instagram post , actress Saanya Iyer recently shared her favorite childhood memory , delighting fans with a glimpse into her nostalgic past.
The talented star reminisced about her cherished moments of indulging in HaalKova , a beloved treat from her childhood days.The Instagram post featured a video of Saanya relishing a piece of HaalKova from a local petty shop , evoking fond memories of her younger years.In the caption, she shared the story behind her affection for this sweet delicacy, revealing that as a child, she would eagerly pester her family for 50 paisa every day to purchase the delicious treat from the nearby Shetty Angadi .
"For me, it's always been the little things," Saanya expressed in her heartfelt post, reflecting on the simple joys that bring happiness to her inner child.Saanya's nostalgic trip down memory lane resonated deeply with her followers, who flooded the comments section with messages of nostalgia and appreciation for her candid sharing.
Many fans reminisced about their childhood memories associated with favorite treats, highlighting the universal appeal of reliving cherished moments from the past.Saanya's genuine and heartfelt reflection on her favorite childhood memory struck a chord with her audience, emphasizing the importance of appreciating the little joys in life.With each post, Saanya Iyer continues to share glimpses of her life, inspiring others to find joy in ordinary moments and cherish the memories that shape who they are.
And as she savors a piece of HaalKova, Saanya invites her followers to join her on a journey of nostalgia and appreciation for life's simple pleasures.

Title: ‘Varshangalkku Shesham’ trivia: Vineeth Sreenivasan reveals Priyadarshan’s contributions to the multistarrer film
Summary:
Varshangalkku Shesham - Official TrailerDirector Vineeth Sreenivasan 's much-anticipated project, ‘ Varshangalkku Shesham ,’ starring Pranav Mohanlal and Dhyan Sreenivasan , is generating buzz ahead of its release.In a recent interview, Vineeth shared intriguing insights into the film's creation, highlighting the invaluable assistance he received from veteran filmmaker Priyadarshan in recreating the ambiance of 1970s Madras.Speaking to Asianet News, Vineeth revealed how he sought feedback from Priyadarshan, who spent his formative years in Madras during the 1970s and 80s.
This creative decision proved vital as Priyadarshan provided crucial details about Swami’s Lodge, a pivotal backdrop in the film, along with experiences he gained from a film studio that seamlessly integrated into the narrative.Priyadarshan's contributions enriched the script of ‘Varshangalkku Shesham,’ which is set against the backdrop of the Malayalam film industry.
The movie traverses two timelines – the 1970s and the present.Newcomer Amrith Ramnath composes the original score for the film, promising a blend of nostalgia and contemporary storytelling.Pranav Mohanlal and Dhyan Sreenivasan essay the protagonists' roles, with Kalyani Priyadarshan portraying the female lead.
Additionally, the film features a cameo appearance by the popular star Nivin Pauly, adding to the excitement surrounding the project.
The recently released songs from the film received mediocre reviews.

Akshay Kumar is currently gearing up for the release of "Bade Miyan Chote Miyan," marking his first film release of 2024.
Known for his frequent movie releases each year, Akshay Kumar's upcoming projects include the highly anticipated C Sankaran Nair biopic.
Reports indicate that the period drama, which commenced filming last year, has been titled "The Untold Story of C Sankaran Nair," also known as "Shankara.

Title: Stocks Under F&O Ban: Zee Entertainment Enterprises Limited
Summary:
Under the futures and options (F&O) segment, one stock was banned from trade on Monday, 1 April by the National Stock Exchange (NSE).
The securities banned for the F&O trade is Zee Entertainment Enterprises Limited.
Zee Entertainment Enterprises Limited was retained on the list from Thursday as the open interest as a percentage of the MWPL of its F&O contracts stood at 80.4%.
The National Stock Exchange updates the list of securities on the F&O ban list daily.
Traders who trade in indices do not encounter a situation of security ban.

Title: Imtiaz Ali opens up about choosing an OTT release for 'Amar Singh Chamkila'
Summary:
Imtiaz Ali's upcoming directorial film, ' Amar Singh Chamkila ', is generating significant anticipation among fans.
Starring Diljit Dosanjh and Parineeti Chopra in the lead roles, the film promises to captivate audiences with its intriguing storyline.
In a recent interview, Imtiaz Ali talked about his decision to opt for an OTT release over a traditional theatrical release for the film.Imtiaz told Pinkvilla that new things come along, and people must try them.
When he closes his eyes and thinks about a film, he always imagines himself on the big screen in a theater, watching the big screen.
So, that’s the reason why they made Chamkila in Hindi; that’s not a question, but that’s his answer.

Title: Kartik Aaryan starts shooting for the second schedule of 'Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3'
Summary:
Kabir Khan's 'sweet' surprise for Kartik Aaryan on 'Chandu Champion' setsActor Kartik Aaryan has kicked off filming for the second part of Anees Bazmee’s new spooky comedy movie, "Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3."
He made the announcement via an Instagram update on Monday, April 1st, 2024.In the shared picture, Kartik Aaryan is sporting a vibrant blue shirt, exuding a casual yet stylish vibe as he strikes a playful pose with the "" hand gesture, often associated with fun.His caption reads "Fun trip khatam Kaam Shuru" ("Fun trip over, work begins"), followed by hashtags for Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 and Schedule 2.Kartik Aaryan and his co-star Triptii Dimri shared that they wrapped up the initial filming phase of Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 on March 28th.
It also starred actors like Akshay Kumar , Shiney Ahuja , Ameesha Patel, and Paresh Rawal.
The second movie, which had Kartik Aaryan, Kiara Advani, and Tabu, told the story of a spirit seeking revenge.Apart from this, Kartik is also working on Kabir Khan's upcoming sports drama, Chandu Champion, which is set to release on June 14.
Recently, he met footballer Harry Kane during a Bundesliga football league match in Germany and learned a Hindi dialogue from Chandu Champion.

Summary:
Shakti Kapoor narrated a story about Amitabh Bachchan and his fellow actors from the movie ' Satte Pe Satta pulling a prank on him during the filming of the song "Dukki Pe Dukki Ho.

Title: Avinash Tiwary reveals Ranbir Kapoor's reaction to 'Madgaon Express'
Summary:
Ranbir Kapoor reveals how he negotiated with Alia Bhatt's sisters and friends during joota chupai ceremonyActor Avinash Tiwary , who is currently enjoying the success of his recently released 'Madgaon Express', revealed what Ranbir Kapoor told him after watching the film.
He also spilled the beans on what Triptii Dimri messaged him.During his interview with News 18, Avinash recalled the premiere of 'Madgaon Express'.
He recounted standing outside the theater when Ranbir Kapoor exited and approached him.Acknowledging the film's energy, Avinash remembered the Barfi star's words, "You guys have made a super hit film!
"Avinash Tiwary also added that he felt really nice after hearing Ranbir’s reaction and seeing him excited and happy for the film and them.Avinash Tiwary and Triptii Dimri shared the screen in Laila Majnu , and their on-screen chemistry garnered widespread acclaim.
It also stars Divyenndu , Avinash Tiwary, and Nora Fatehi in pivotal roles.

Title: Akshay Kumar participates in breaking Shri Hansratna Surishwarji's 180-day fast with his first meal
Summary:
Akshay Kumar was honored to participate in a poignant moment as he served a meal to Shri Hansratna Surishwarji , a distinguished Jain monk who concluded his 180-day fast at NSCI, Mumbai, on March 31.
Dressed in an elegant kurta, the actor warmly participated in the grand ceremony.Shri Hansratna Surishwarji, completing this fast for the seventh time, sustained himself solely on water, making it a remarkable feat.Akshay's participation in helping him break the fast was considered a blessed moment.

Summary:
Boney Kapoor papped with daughter Janhvi Kapoor's rumoured boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya, gets trolled onlineActress Sridevi 's ' English Vinglish ' remains one of her most beloved movies to date.
Her convincing performance as Shashi, a kind-hearted woman striving to learn English in the USA to earn her family's respect, captured the hearts of audiences.But did you know that the film was supposed to be made with Aishwarya Rai until he convinced the makers to cast Sridevi instead?

Title: Ananya Panday's adorably REACTS to cousin Alanna's baby bump; says, 'Why is it so big?'
Summary:
#CelebritySpotting: From Ananya Panday to Rakul Preet Singh to Anil Kapoor, Bollywood celebs get spotted in MumbaiThe internet is abuzz with joy as Bollywood star Ananya Panday 's heartwarming reaction to her cousin Alanna Panday 's baby bump takes center stage.
Ananya, elated at the prospect of becoming a 'Masi,' recently surprised Alanna with a visit, capturing the touching moment on camera and winning hearts across social media platforms.In the video, Ananya is seen arriving unannounced at Alanna's doorstep, greeted warmly by her cousin.As Alanna welcomes her inside, Ananya's eyes light up with excitement, and she gently caresses Alanna's baby bump, expressing her joy at the impending arrival of a new family member.
The genuine affection shared between the cousins is visible as they share heartfelt hugs, their bond strengthened by the anticipation of the new addition to their family.Ananya's playful remark about the size of Alanna's baby bump, exclaiming, "Why is it so big?
It's so huge," adds a touch of lighthearted humor to the heartfelt moment, showcasing the close-knit relationship between the cousins.Meanwhile, Alanna Panday, daughter of Chikki Panday and fitness instructor Deanne Panday, announced her pregnancy in February alongside her husband, Ivor McCray.
The couple, who tied the knot last year, shared the delightful news through a nature-themed maternity shoot, capturing the essence of their joy and anticipation for the journey into parenthood.

Title: 'Tie him a rakhi'; Boney Kapoor's mom requested Sridevi upon sensing Boney Kapoor's feelings for the late actress
Summary:
He disclosed that his mother requested Sridevi to tie him a rakhi.Boney admitted that his love for Sridevi was there.
He mentioned that Mona was well aware of his feelings for Sridevi, as Sridevi had even stayed in their house before their marriage .
The filmmaker explained that he had gone out of his way for Sridevi in many ways, and Mona could clearly see this.Boney Kapoor and Sridevi tied the knot in 1996.
Prior to their marriage, Boney had two children from his previous marriage with Mona (Arjun Kapoor and Anshula Kapoor).
After marrying Sridevi, Boney welcomed two daughters, Janhvi Kapoor and Khushi Kapoor, into the family.

Title: Rakul Preet Singh's adorable reaction as Paparazzi teases Jackky Bhagnani to sit beside her in the car
Summary:
Rakul Preet Singh and Jackky Bhagnani tied the knot on February 21 this year in Goa.
The star-studded event saw the presence of several celebrities, including Shilpa Shetty , Raj Kundra, Varun Dhawan , Natasha Dalal , Ananya Panday, and Aditya Roy Kapur.A trending video circulating on social media captures Rakul Preet Singh and Jackky Bhagnani leaving a restaurant after dinner.
Joined by actress Pragya Jaiswal, they headed towards their car, with Rakul and Pragya occupying the back seats while Jackky settled into the passenger seat.
Playfully, the paparazzi suggested Jackky sit beside Rakul, evoking blushes from both.Earlier, Rakul reflected on the changes in her relationship with Jackky after tying the knot.
Rakul emphasized the importance of maintaining their individuality and leaving work behind when they are together.

Title: Anees Bazmee: No rush to replace Salman Khan's character in 'No Entry 2' Exclusive
Summary:
Will start shooting ‘No Entry’ when Salman Khan says: Director Anees Bazmee reactsDirector Anees Bazmee , set to helm the highly anticipated sequel ' No Entry 2 ,' recently expressed confidence in the enduring bond between Bollywood stalwarts Anil Kapoor and Boney Kapoor .
"While rumors of discord persist, Anees Bazmee revealed that neither of the Kapoor brothers had directly communicated any issues to him, opting instead to address the matter privately.
"Addressing the eagerly awaited casting details, Anees Bazmee dismissed speculations about replacing Salman Khan's iconic character, affirming that neither Khan nor Anil Kapoor can be replicated.
As the director stated, "Nobody can replace Salman Khan or Anil Kapoor.
"Regarding the production timeline, Anees Bazmee revealed that while the script has been finalized for some time, there is no rush to commence filming.

Title: 'Game Changer' makers tease fans with expected release date of the Ram Charan starrer

Title: OMEGA X's agency updates fans on SPIRE Entertainment lawsuit and future actions
Summary:
In a recent turn of events, OMEGA X 's agency, IPQ , has emerged victorious in their legal battles against SPIRE Entertainment and YouTuber In Ji Woong.
The decision underscores OMEGA X's determination to safeguard their rights and interests in the face of adversity.Additionally, IPQ provided updates on the lawsuit against YouTuber In Ji Woong, who had tarnished the reputations of OMEGA X members by spreading false information.
Last month, SPIRE Entertainment made additional claims against one of the group's members, which were promptly refuted by IPQ in a detailed rebuttal.Now, let's shift gears and talk about the stars of the show – OMEGA X.
Despite the legal battles and the tumultuous journey, OMEGA X has emerged stronger than ever.
With their exclusive contract terminated and justice served against detractors, OMEGA X can now focus on their music and the continued support of their dedicated fanbase.

Title: Dev Patel shares challenges faced during 'Monkey Man' shoot
Summary:
Dev Patel , star of the upcoming action thriller movie "Monkey Man," recently opened up about the numerous hurdles encountered during the film's production.
Prop shortages also forced the crew to repair broken tables between takes.The journey to complete "Monkey Man" was far from smooth.
Patel recalled moments of crisis when the project faced potential shutdowns, particularly when COVID-19 disrupted plans to film in India.
"Monkey Man" marks Patel's feature directorial debut, which he co-wrote with Paul Angunawela and John Collee .
Despite the hardships faced during production, Patel's dedication and resilience shine through, promising an unforgettable cinematic experience for audiences.

Title: Boney Kapoor says he understood Arjun Kapoor's anger after his second marriage with Sridevi: 'I didn't retaliate'
Summary:
Boney Kapoor was married to Mona Shourie in 1983 and was married to her till 1996 post which he tied the knot with Sridevi .
Boney has two children with Mona, Arjun Kapoor and Anshula Kapoor and for the longest time, Arjun was deeply hurt by his father's decision and second marriage with Sridevi.
"Though, it was hard for Boney to get over his guilt but he was very honest to his wife Mona about his feelings for Sridevi.

Title: "Mujhe ek Hindustan UK mein banana hai": Vashu Bhagnani says 'Mission Raniganj', 'Shaitaan' shot at his England studio
Summary:
Built over three years ago in the UK, the studio is spread over a large area in the UK's Luton.It is just "36 miles from London.
In fact, the scenes portrayed as Dubai and Pakistan in Bellbottom were actually shot at our studio in UK.
Almost 80 per cent of Shaitaan was shot there...the big farmhouse which you saw in Shaitaan was created at my studio only," he shared."
It's my dream to be a good developer as well," he added.Bhagnani also explained what made him establish the film studio abroad."

Title: Shivarajkumar collaborates with R Chandru for the third time

Title: Ewan McGregor wants to reprise Obi-Wan Kenobi's role in future 'Star Wars' projects
Summary:
Ewan McGregor , known for his portrayal of Obi-Wan Kenobi in the Star Wars universe, hopes to return to the iconic role once again.
After the success of Season 1 of the Disney+ series featuring Obi-Wan, McGregor expressed his interest in continuing to play the character.In a recent interview, McGregor revealed that he had to keep his involvement in the stand-alone series a secret for years before its announcement.However, he now admits that he's uncertain about his future with the franchise, as he hasn't received any calls from Lucasfilm or Disney regarding another project.While McGregor loved working on the Obi-Wan series and hopes for another opportunity, he remains unsure about its possibility.
He mentioned that the series was originally planned as a limited one, but he's optimistic about the potential for more stories in the future.The Obi-Wan Kenobi series on Disney+ consisted of six episodes, focusing on the Jedi Master's mission to rescue Princess Leia from the Galactic Empire's Inquisitors.
Throughout the series, Obi-Wan also confronts his former apprentice, Darth Vader .McGregor's enthusiasm for returning to the role of Obi-Wan Kenobi reflects his dedication to the character and the Star Wars universe.
Fans can only hope that his wish to continue portraying the beloved Jedi Master will come true in future projects .

Title: Vijay Deverakonda's Criteria for Collaborating with Debut Directors Revealed
Summary:
Vijay Deverakonda , the renowned Telugu actor, is currently in the spotlight as he promotes his upcoming film ' The Family Star ', slated for a theatrical release on April 5, 2024.
The movie, directed by Parasuram , features Mrunal Thakur in the lead role.In a recent interview with Indiaglitz, Vijay discussed his approach to working with debut directors from Tamil cinema .He expressed his hesitation to collaborate with newcomers straight out of the gate, preferring directors who have at least done one film.
This allows him to measure their skills in various aspects of filmmaking, including music, editing, and visual storytelling.
Vijay stressed that a director's debut film doesn't necessarily need to be a commercial success for him to consider collaborating with them; instead, he prioritizes his personal appreciation for their work.Vijay's comments shed light on his discerning approach to selecting projects and collaborators, highlighting his commitment to quality and excellence in filmmaking.
As anticipation builds for the release of 'The Family Star', fans eagerly await Vijay's next cinematic outing.After 'The Family Star', Vijay will be working on his upcoming spy action thriller film, tentatively called 'VD12'.

Title: Indian politics roiled as huge donations are linked to investigated firms
Summary:

Jalan’s companies confidentially donated millions to Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Bharatiya Janata Party, newly released records show.
In many instances, the records show, Indian companies gave donations just as they received major government contracts — a familiar practice around the world.
But there was a more striking pattern: Almost half of the top 30 corporate donors were facing government investigations around the time they purchased electoral bonds.
The unsettling conclusion reached by Indian political observers is that either Indian business titans have been regularly seeking to bribe their way out of trouble — or the BJP-controlled government has been using investigative agencies to extort them.

Title: Mint Explainer: What is the controversy over Katchatheevu Island about?
Summary:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi has reignited a longstanding debate in Indian politics by criticizing the Congress party for relinquishing control of the Katchatheevu Island to Sri Lanka in 1974, under Indira Gandhi's leadership.
Katchatheevu is an uninhabited island situated in the Palk Strait, lying between India and Sri Lanka.
Following extensive negotiations that began in the early 20th century, India and Sri Lanka signed a maritime boundary agreement in 1974, assigning the island to Sri Lankan territory.
Media reports alleged DMK's M Karunanidhi's acquiescence in transferring the island to Sri Lanka, despite the party's public stand against such a move.

These alliances benefit the regional parties that are also finding it increasingly difficult to tackle the BJP on their own.
The INDIA bloc (Congress, regional parties and the Left) remains a selective State-wise alliance that is determined by the need for unity against the BJP.
The Congress has grown closer to the Mandal parties by emphasising the need for a caste census while the Left remains a small but viable political entity in Bihar because of its base among the poor.

The IMD said that the weather over Northeast India is under the influence of a cyclonic circulation over northeast Assam and a north-south trough that runs from east Bihar to north Bay of Bengal in lower tropospheric levels.

Title: Weather update: IMD issues heatwave alert, predicts rainfall today in THESE states; Check full forecast here
Summary:
IMD Weather Update today: The weather forecast suggests rainfall in a few northeastern states, as per the India Meteorological Department (IMD) press release.
The weather department issued a heatwave alert in several South Indian states for the next few days.
The weather department press release stated, “A trough runs from northwest Bihar to southeast Assam and a trough in westerlies runs roughly along Long.
Thus, considering these prevailing atmospheric conditions, IMD predicted moderate rainfall accompanied by thunderstorms and lightning over Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram, Tripura, West Bengal and Sikkim until tomorrow.
Additionally, IMD forecasted heat wave conditions over Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra and Karnataka from April 2 to 4.

Title: Met Department forecasts heatwave conditions in south Bengal till April 5 - Telegraph India
Summary:
Southern districts of West Bengal are likely to experience heatwave conditions till April 5, the Met Department said on Monday.
Heatwave conditions are expected to prevail from April 3-5 in the districts of Purulia, Bankura, West Bardhaman, West Midnapore and Jhargram, it said.
ADVERTISEMENTDue to the prevailing dry westerly winds over the region, such conditions are “very likely to occur over the districts of south Bengal”, the weather office said in a bulletin.
The maximum day temperatures are likely to rise by 2 to 4 degrees Celsius in south Bengal during the next three days, it said.
The bulletin added that the maximum temperatures are going to be above normal by 4 to 5 degrees Celsius over the western districts from April 3-5.

Title: MeT Predicts Dry, Clear Weather Till April 6th in Kashmir
Summary:
SRINAGAR: After three days, weather conditions improved in the Kashmir region, with the Meteorological Department forecasting mainly dry and clear weather until April 6th.
Dr Mukhtar Ahmad, Director of the MeT Srinagar, stated that the plains in Kashmir experienced light to moderate rains, while the upper reaches received snowfall until Sunday morning.
Some areas also witnessed thunder and lightning accompanied by gusty winds over the plains of Kashmir and Jammu Division.
“From April 1st to 6th, the weather will predominantly be dry and clear.
Dr Mukhtar further mentioned that from the evening of April 6th, the weather will generally become cloudy with light rain and snow expected at scattered places in the Kashmir region.

Title: Weather improves after rain in Kashmir
Summary:
Srinagar, Apr 1 (UNI) After intermittent rains and snowfall in higher reaches for the past three days, the weather improved across Jammu and Kashmir on Monday.
The Meteorological Centre Srinagar said on Monday that the weather is likely to remain dry for the next 24 hours.
There is a possibility of rain or snow at scattered, isolated places on April 3, while rain and snow could occur at scattered places on April 6–7.
The bright sun appeared with pleasant weather conditions in Srinagar and other parts of the Kashmir valley on Monday.
The tourist resort of Pahalgam in south Kashmir’s Anantnag district dipped to 0.7°C against 0.8°C the previous night, and it was 1.0°C below normal for the tourist spot in south Kashmir.

Title: Night Temp Rises Amid Dry Weather Forecast In Kashmir
Summary:
SRINAGAR, Apr 1: Night temperature recorded increase in most parts of Jammu and Kashmir on Monday, officials said.
Pahalgam recorded a low of 0.7°C against 0.8°C on the previous night and it was 1.0°C below normal for the famous resort in south Kashmir.
Kokernag, also in south Kashmir, recorded a minimum of 6.8°C against 4.2°C on the previous night and it was 1.7°C above normal, the official said.
Kupwara town recorded a low of 3.5°C against 4.1°C on the previous night and it was 1.7°C below normal there, the official said.
With regard to the forecast, he said, generally dry weather is expected till April 5 except April 3 when fairly widespread rain has been forecast.

Title: Pune IMD’s Weather Forecasting Division Head Dr Anupam Kashyapi Retires After 31 years Of Service
Summary:
Share This NewsDr Anupam Kashyapi, head of IMD Pune’s weather forecasting division, recently retired after an illustrious career spanning 31 years and 8 months.
Beginning as a trainee meteorologist in 1992, Dr. Kashyapi served in various capacities, including meteorologist in charge of the training unit and director of the Agrometeorological Field Unit (AMFU) Scientists’ course.
During his career, Dr. Kashyapi was transferred to Meteorological Centre (MC) Gangtok, Sikkim, where he played a pivotal role in weather forecasts and agricultural meteorology.
Upon returning to Pune, he led the Weather Forecasting Division, spearheading its modernization efforts and implementing proactive measures.
Dr Anupam Kashyapi’s dedication and expertise have left an indelible mark on IMD Pune’s meteorological operations, setting a high standard for future endeavours in weather forecasting and disaster management.

The importance of accurate and timely weather forecasts will only increase as the climate changes.
SEEDS is a generative AI model that can efficiently generate ensembles of weather forecasts at scale at a small fraction of the cost of traditional physics-based forecasting models.
Recognizing the limitations of deterministic forecasts, weather agencies around the world issue probabilistic forecasts.
SEEDS: AI-enabled advancesIn the aforementioned paper, we present the Scalable Ensemble Envelope Diffusion Sampler (SEEDS), a generative AI technology for weather forecast ensemble generation.
As Lorenz points out, “The [weather forecast] maps which they produce should look like real weather maps."

Title: Severe weather to ramp up in central US starting on Easter Sunday
Summary:
Severe weather to ramp up in central US starting on Easter SundayDamaging storms and isolated tornadoes will be possible during the first few days of April over the central United States.
"The main threat of severe weather on Sunday will stem from significant hail," AccuWeather Meteorologist Joseph Bauer said.
Should the severe weather evolve to its full potential, there could be a significant outbreak that involves multiple strong tornadoes.
This threat of severe weather includes the central part of Alabama and the Atlanta metro area.
The severe weather threat can also extend to part of the mid-Atlantic coast, including the Washington, D.C. metro area.

Summary:
NEW DELHI: India is investigating information related to the alleged plot to kill Khalistani leader Gurpatwant Singh Pannun because it involves the country’s national security interests, external affairs minister S Jaishankar said on Monday.
India, he said, is conducting a probe “because we believe our own national security interests are involved in that investigation”.

Title: Tiger unexpectedly attacks cow at Ranthambore National Park, tourists record video
Summary:
Tourists enjoying a jungle safari at the Ranthambore National Park in Rajasthan over the weekend witnessed a scenario that sent a chill down their spine: a tiger’s unexpected encounter with a cow.
The incident was caught on camera by tourists as the video was posted on Instagram by the authorities of Ranthambore National Park.
Watch the video here:Videos from Ranthambore National Park are often posted on Instagram, and they are nothing but a treat for wildlife enthusiasts.
Over the weekend, a video of a tiger dragging its prey into a waterhole in the park also surfaced on the internet.
Located in the Sawai Madhopur district of southeastern Rajasthan, Ranthambore National Park was once considered a popular hunting ground for the Maharajas of Jaipur.

Title: Baltimore bridge collapse a 'national economic catastrophe', says Maryland Governor
Summary:
WASHINGTON: Describing the collapse of Francis Scott Key bridge last week as America's " national economic catastrophe ", Maryland Governor Wes Moore has said the removal of the wreckage of the bridge and the cargo ship that was mainly manned by an Indian crew is a complex and time-consuming operation.
"This is not a Baltimore catastrophe, not a Maryland catastrophe.
This is a national economic catastrophe," Moore told CNN in an interview on Sunday.Moore said this port is one of the busiest, most active ports in the country.
"So, this is not just going to have an impact on Maryland.
"Whether you're talking about all those various industries, the Port of Baltimore is the largest in the country for all of those things.

Title: Teja Vidyalaya students make it to Fit India Quiz national finals
Summary:
April 01, 2024 07:11 pm | Updated 07:11 pm IST - HYDERABADOut of the eight schools in the State that were selected after a preliminary exercise, two students of Teja Vidyalaya in Kodada on Monday emerged as State-level contenders for the national Fit India Quiz 2023.
They will now compete in the national finals to be held in New Delhi, which carries a cash prize of ₹35 lakh, later this month.
Fit India Quiz, part of the Fit India Mission launched by Prime Minister Narendra Modi in 2019, engages schoolchildren across the country to propagate the message of the mission.
The preliminary round of the quiz was conducted by the National Testing Agency (NTA).
In the State, the Sports Authority of India and the Union Ministry of Youth and Sports have been supervising the procedures for students of classes 8 to 12.

Title: National Conference cuts Mehbooba no slack, fields LS candidate from her home seat
Summary:
The National Conference (NC) on Monday announced the candidature of senior party leader Mian Altaf Ahmed Lahrvi from the Anantnag-Rajouri parliamentary seat, which is the home constituency of the NC’s INDIA alliance partner and Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) president Mehbooba Mufti.
Both Mehbooba, who won from Anantnag in 2014, and her father and PDP founder Mufti Mohammad Sayeed have represented the constituency in Parliament.
Announcing the candidature, Omar said, “There is no better candidate for the Anantnag-Rajouri seat than Mian sahab.
The constituency, earlier called the Anantnag parliamentary seat, was represented by Justice (retired) Hasnain Masoodi of the NC in the outgoing Lok Sabha.
In 2019, he secured 32% of the votes, defeating G A Mir of the Congress by more than 6,000 votes.

Title: 74 Cocaine Capsules Removed From Body Of Sierra Leone National Held At Mumbai Airport
Summary:
HomeMaharashtra74 Cocaine Capsules Removed From Body Of Sierra Leone National Held At Mumbai Airport74 Cocaine Capsules Removed From Body Of Sierra Leone National Held At Mumbai AirportA Sierra Leone national was arrested at the Mumbai airport and 74 cocaine capsules were later removed from his body by a team of doctors.
Representational ImageDoctors removed as many as 74 cocaine-filled capsules from the stomach of a Sierra Leone national after he was arrested by the Directorate of Revenue Intelligence (DRI) at the Mumbai airport.
Officials said the accused was attempting to smuggle cocaine worth Rs 11 crore in capsules concealed in his body.
During questioning, the accused revealed that he had ingested cocaine capsules in bid to smuggle the banned narcotic substance into India.
Notably, this is the second case in a week involving a Sierra Leone national held with cocaine at the Mumbai airport.

Title: How to Rejuvenate the Indian National Congress
Summary:
Any pan-India challenge to the BJP’s political hegemony in national elections cannot be envisioned without the Congress.
The Congress’ electoral prospects for the upcoming Lok Sabha elections don’t quite inspire unbridled optimism.
On the issue of party leadership, the Congress seems to have faltered the most — both at the national and the state level.
So, despite the immediate gloom, the Congress, as a viable national political alternative, has a responsibility to resurrect itself.
It remains critical that India’s national political space has a functioning and impactful opposition force.

Title: National Ferret Day 2024: Date, History, Purpose, Celebration Ideas, and Events
Summary:

It was an accidental discovery that led to the conservation efforts of the black-footed ferret, which is now considered a species of ferret.
Spend Time With Your FerretAnother way to celebrate National Ferret Day is to spend time with your pet ferret.
If you have a ferret, it is important to provide them with love and attention.
Ferrets love attention and will often break into a jig known as the “Ferret war dance” when they are showered with affection.

Title: National Highways Authority of India's One Vehicle, One FASTag norm comes into force - Telegraph India
Summary:
State-owned National Highways Authority of India's 'One Vehicle, One FASTag' norm, which aims to discourage the use of single FASTag for multiple vehicles or linking multiple FASTags to a particular vehicle, has come into force from Monday, a senior official said.
NHAI had extended the 'One Vehicle, One FASTag' initiative compliance deadline to March-end, in view of the problems being faced by Paytm FASTag users.
ADVERTISEMENT"Multiple FASTags won't work... People who have multiple FASTags for one vehicle won't be able to use all of them from today (April 1)," the official told PTI.
FASTag is an electronic toll collection system in India, operated by the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI).
With a penetration rate of around 98 per cent and over 8 crore users, FASTag has revolutionised the electronic toll collection system in the country.

Title: National Doctor’s Day 2024: Theme, history significance, celebrations
Summary:
National Doctor’s Day 2024 is celebrated on March 30th each year to honor physicians and the contributions they make to society.
National Doctor's Day 2024 ThemeThe website of National Doctors revealed the 2024 theme which is “Wings & Stethoscopes: Healers of Hope."
National Doctor's Day 2024 HistoryNational Doctors' Day has its origins in recognition of the first use of general anesthesia in surgery by Dr. Crawford W. Long in 1842.
President George H. W. Bush issued a proclamation in 1991 declaring March 30th to be National Doctors' Day in the US.
National Doctor's Day 2024 CelebrationsHospitals and medical facilities frequently plan events to commemorate and acknowledge their doctors on National Doctors Day.

Title: India Celebrates National Maritime Week 2024
Summary:
This marked the beginning of the National Maritime Week celebrations, which span from March 29 to April 5.
Honouring Seafarers and Maritime HistoryNational Maritime Week is celebrated to honour the services of seafarers and commemorate a proud moment in India’s maritime history.
Maritime India Vision 2030Under the Maritime India Vision 2030, India aspires to emerge as a premier seafaring nation by establishing world-class standards in education, research, and training within the maritime sector.
Indian seafarers occupy 12% of international seafaring jobs, and the Maritime Vision 2030 recommends that this figure reach 20% by 2030.
The National Maritime Week celebrations highlight India’s rich maritime heritage and the significant contributions of seafarers to the nation’s economic growth and global trade.

Title: YI Jamshedpur to organise national level innovation competition
Summary:
AdvertisementsAdvertisements16 teams from various colleges of Jamshedpur to participateJamshedpur: Imagine – Do – Share (IDS) is a national-level competition organized by CII-Young Indians ( YI) across 65 cities in the country.
Students from colleges across the country will participate in the competition, which will be organised in three levels.

Title: Tata International appoints Rajeev Singhal as its managing director
Summary:
Tata Group's global trading and distribution arm, Tata International on Monday announced the appointment of Rajeev Singhal as its Managing Director (MD).
Singhal whose appointment to the new position is effective from April 1, succeeds Anand Sen, who superannuated on March 31, 2024, Tata International said in a statement.
Prior to this, Singhal was Executive Director and Chief Operating Officer (COO) at Tata International.
"We are confident that under his leadership, Tata International will scale to greater heights into its next phase of growth," said Noel N Tata, Chairman of Tata International.
Singhal brings over 36 years of experience to his new position, having transitioned from Tata Steel, where he served in various positions including Vice President for marketing and sales for flat products, according to the statement.

Title: Pakistani man arrested near international border in Punjab
Summary:

Swiftly responding to the situation, the troops cordoned off the area and caught the Pakistani national at 6:05 pm.
BSF troops seized two mobile phones, Rs 840 in Pakistani currency notes and one Pakistani national identity card from the accused.

Title: Finance Minister Sitharaman praises RBI’s economic management amidst challenges
Summary:
Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman commended the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) deft handling of economy amidst global challenges and professional stewardship of the Central Bank.
Speaking on the occasion of the RBI’s 90th anniversary, the Finance Minister praised its efforts in improving the balance sheet challenges confronting banks.
Sitharaman underscored the RBI’s adeptness in inflation management, noting its success in stabilising government bond (G-secs) yields despite pressures for monetary tightening.
Reflecting on the past, Sitharaman recalled India’s banking landscape a decade ago marred by balance sheet woes.
Today, she asserted, the nation enjoys a “balance sheet advantage” as a result of the collaborative endeavours of the government and the RBI.

Title: Finance Ministry clarifies: No changes in new tax regime, issues 6-point note
Summary:
Follow us on Image Source : INDIA TV Finance Ministry clarifies: No changes in new tax regime, issues 6-point noteAmidst speculations, the Finance Ministry has clarified that there will be no new changes in the tax regime from April 1, 2024, as the interim budget’s income tax proposals take effect.
Introduction of new tax regime: The new tax regime under Section 115BAC(1A) was introduced in the Finance Act 2023, differing from the existing old regime.
Lower tax rates: While the new tax regime offers significantly lower tax rates, it does not provide the benefit of various exemptions and deductions available in the old regime.
Opt-out option: Taxpayers have the option to opt out of the new tax regime until filing their returns for AY 2024–25.
Interim budget tax slabsAs per the interim budget, the income tax slabs remain unchanged for the new financial year (FY2024–25).

Title: Ministry of Finance debunks falsehoods: New tax regime clarified, no changes on horizon
Summary:
(You can now subscribe to our(You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channelNew Delhi: In response to widespread misinformation circulating on various social media platforms, the Ministry of Finance issued a clarification regarding the applicability of the new tax regime versus the existing one.The statement, posted on X, addressed misconceptions surrounding changes purportedly taking effect from April 1, 2024.Ministry of Finance posted, "Ministry of Finance posted on X, "It has come to notice that misleading information related to new tax regime is being spread on some social media platforms.
It is therefore clarified that: There is no new change which is coming in from 01.04.2024....."https://twitter.com/finminindia/status/1774504330499879372?s=48&t=CSE0glwGSDCXRHUtG7cLjwThe Ministry categorically stated that there are no new alterations slated for implementation on April 1, 2024.Instead, it underscored that the new tax regime under section 115BAC(1A) was introduced in the Finance Act 2023.This regime, as compared to the existing one, presents different tax brackets and provisions.The new tax regime, denoted under section 115BAC(1A), is applicable for individuals other than companies and firms.It serves as the default regime starting from the financial year 2023-24, with the corresponding assessment year being AY 2024-25.Under the new tax regime, tax rates are notably lower than those in the existing regime.However, it's important to note that various exemptions and deductions , excluding the standard deduction of Rs.
50,000 from salary and Rs.
15,000 from family pension, are not available.
Taxpayers retain the autonomy to select the tax regime they deem most advantageous to their financial situation.They can opt for either the old or new tax regime.

Title: India's finance ministry clears confusion on new tax regime. Here's its six-point sum-up
Summary:
In a post on X, the finance ministry cleared all the confusion over the new tax regime.
What did the finance ministry clarify on the new tax regime?
New tax regime is the default tax regime, however, tax payers can choose the tax regime (old or new) that they think is beneficial to them.
Option for opting out from the new tax regime is available till filing of return for the AY 2024-25.
So, they can choose new tax regime in one financial year and old tax regime in another year and vice versa."

Title: PNB Housing Finance gets three credit rating upgrades in a quarter
Summary:

Title: Those 'dancing' over scrapping of electoral bonds to repent it, says PM Modi
Summary:
(With PTI inputs)NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that those "dancing and taking pride" over the scrapping of the electoral bond scheme will soon repent it.
This marks as PM Modi 's first reaction to the now-defunct poll bond scheme introduced by the government in 2017.In a recent interview with a Tamil TV channel, PM Modi dismissed the argument that the Supreme Court 's striking down of the electoral bond scheme as unconstitutional was a setback to his government.The Prime Minister stated that no system is perfect and any shortcomings could be improved upon.
"Tell me, what have we done that I should see it as a setback?
I firmly believe that those celebrating over it (bond details) and taking pride in it are going to repent," he told Thanthi TV.PM Modi highlighted that the electoral bond facilitated a system wherein the funding source and its beneficiaries were traceable.
"If a trail is available today, it is because of the presence of bonds," the PM said, further questioning whether any agency could disclose the sources of funding and their beneficiaries for the elections before 2014.Congress leader Rahul Gandhi has alleged that electoral bonds were the biggest extortion racket in the world.Addressing a rally in Maharashtra's Thane, Rahul alleged that the funds amassed through the scheme were used to split political parties and topple opposition governments.He claimed that there was no connection between contracts given by Congress governments in states and electoral bonds.Opposition parties have targeted the BJP, a day after the Election Commission displayed details of electoral bonds on its website as per the orders of the Supreme Court.Data uploaded by the EC on its website discloses details of electoral bonds worth Rs 12,155 crore, bought from SBI between April 12, 2019, and January 24 this year, and a list of bonds deposited by parties in their accounts over this period for a total of Rs 12,769 crore.The EC data shows that while the BJP received the largest amount — Rs 6,061 crore or almost half the total — of contributions via electoral bonds, the next biggest recipient was TMC (Rs 1,610 crore).Parties that have been governing states featured higher on the list than those in opposition, with one exception being JD(U), which, while governing Bihar the entire time, received only Rs 14 crore.Many firms facing criminal probes have also turned out to be big buyers of these bonds.

Title: ‘He fully lied to nation’: Congress reacts to PM Modi's statement on electoral bonds
Summary:
After Prime Minister Narendra Modi broke his silence on the now-scrapped electoral bonds scheme, Congress spokesperson Jairam Ramesh on Monday accused him of ‘fully lying to the nation.’ Congress MP Jairam Ramesh and PM Narendra Modi.

Title: PM Modi to speak at a ceremony in Mumbai on April 1 commemorating 90 years of RBI
Summary: NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit Mumbai on Monday, 1 April, 2024, where he will address the ceremony commemorating 90 years of Reserve Bank of India ( RBI ).PM Modi is expected to address the event at 11am.Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman will also be present at the event in Mumbai, where she is also expected to address the audience.The opening address will be delivered by RBI governor Shaktikanta Das.Established in 1935, RBI functions as the nation's central bank, following the recommendations of the Hilton Young Commission and governed by Reserve Bank of India Act, 1934.Its primary responsibilities encompass regulating the issuance of banknotes, maintaining reserves to ensure monetary stability, and managing the credit and currency system of the country.Initially assuming duties from the Controller of Currency and the Imperial Bank of India, RBI oversaw government accounts and public debt, establishing branches across major Indian cities.Post the partition of India and Burma's independence, RBI continued as Burma's central bank until 1947 and for Pakistan until 1948.RBI has played a pivotal role in India's growth, notably in agriculture, and has facilitated the establishment of crucial financial institutions like the Deposit Insurance and Credit Guarantee Corporation of India and the Industrial Development Bank of India.In recent years, amidst liberalization, RBI's focus has shifted towards core central banking functions, including monetary policy formulation, bank supervision and regulation, oversight of the payments system, and fostering the development of financial markets.

Title: What 10 Years of Modi Rule Has Meant for India’s Economy
Summary:
As Narendra Modi was storming to victory in the election of 2014, he said that “acchhe din aane waale hain” — good times are coming.
Now as Mr. Modi stands set to secure another term as prime minister in elections starting on April 19, the value of India’s stock market has grown threefold since he first took office.
India’s economy is almost twice as big as it was.
But the economic gains have been widely unequal.
The bulk of India’s growth depends on those at the top of the income ladder, including a coterie of huge and tightly controlled businesses.

Title: Lok Sabha elections: PM Modi to kick off UP election campaign with rally in Meerut
Summary:
NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to commence his Lok Sabha election campaign in Uttar Pradesh with a rally in Meerut on Sunday, featuring Arun Govil , known for his portrayal of Lord Ram in the popular TV serial 'Ramayan', as the BJP candidate.Alongside Govil, Rashtriya Lok Dal president Jayant Chaudhary , a recent addition to the BJP-led National Democratic Alliance, will also be present on the stage.The rally marks the beginning of PM Modi's election campaign in Uttar Pradesh following the consecration of Lord Ram's idol in Ayodhya.
Arun Govil, who is highly regarded for his role as Lord Ram in 'Ramayan', represents the constituency where the campaign kickstarts.
The coordination of the prime minister's rally is entrusted to Anoop Gupta, the party's state General Secretary.The event is expected to draw attendees not only from Meerut but also from nearby constituencies like Baghpat, Bijnor, Muzaffarnagar, and Kairana.
Senior BJP leader Govind Narayan Shukla expressed confidence that the Meerut rally would be a significant milestone for western Uttar Pradesh, emphasizing the party's determination to secure all 80 Lok Sabha seats in the state.Enhanced security measures have been put in place by the local administration in preparation for the rally, including a ban under Section 144 on flying drones, kites, or balloons within an eight-kilometer radius from the rally venue.The upcoming Lok Sabha elections in Uttar Pradesh will be held across all seven phases, with polling scheduled for Bijnor, Muzaffarnagar, and Kairana constituencies on April 19, followed by Meerut and Baghpat in the second phase on April 26.

Title: 'Appalling and insulting': Trump campaign slams Biden for declaring March 31, Easter Sunday, as transgender day of visibility
Summary:
NEW Delhi: The Trump campaign and other Republican leaders attacked US President Joe Biden for declaring Easter Sunday as the transgender day of visibility .On Friday, the US president, in a statement, said, "Now, therefore, I, Joseph R Biden jr., president of the United States of America, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and the laws of the United States, do hereby proclaim March 31, 2024, as Transgender Day of Visibility.I call upon all Americans to join us in lifting up the lives and voices of transgender people throughout our Nation and to work toward eliminating violence and discrimination based on gender identity.
"The falling of transgender day of visibility and Easter Sunday on the same day is a complete coincidence but Republicans and religious conservative are not leaving a chance to criticise Biden.“It is appalling and insulting that Joe Biden’s White House … formally proclaimed Easter Sunday as ‘Trans Day of Visibility,” former President Donald Trump’s campaign said in a statement.Meanwhile, Karoline Leavitt, the Trump campaign's press secretary said, "We call on Joe Biden’s failing campaign and White House to issue an apology to the millions of Catholics and Christians across America who believe tomorrow is for one celebration only — the resurrection of Jesus Christ."
She assailed what she called the Biden administration's "years-long assault on the Christian faith.”House Speaker Mike Johnson said that the Biden administration has "betrayed the central tenet of Easter" and further added that banning "sacred truth and tradition is outrageous and abhorrent.
"White House spokesperson Andrew Bates said the Republicans criticizing Biden “are seeking to divide and weaken our country with cruel, hateful and dishonest rhetoric.”“As a Christian who celebrates Easter with family, President Biden stands for bringing people together and upholding the dignity and freedoms of every American," Bates said.
"President Biden will never abuse his faith for political purposes or for profit.”(With inputs from agency)

Title: WATCH LIVE: Bidens host the 2024 White House Easter Egg Roll
Summary:
Some 40,000 people are expected to participate in Monday’s “EGG-ucation”-themed White House Easter Egg Roll, about 10,000 more than last year.
Various stations on the South Lawn and Ellipse will help children learn about farming, healthier eating, exercise and more, the White House announced Thursday.
They will be admitted in nine waves, from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m.Monday’s “egg-stravaganza” will be the third Easter egg roll hosted by President Joe Biden and the first lady, who still teaches English and writing at a northern Virginia community college.
They did not host the event in 2021, Biden’s first year in office, because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
The White House Easter Egg Roll dates to 1878, when President Rutherford B. Hayes opened the White House lawn to children after they were kicked off the grounds of the U.S. Capitol.

“It’s one of the stubborn challenges of Trump,” said Robby Mook, campaign manager for Hillary Clinton’s 2016 presidential bid.
“Our digital online fundraising continues to skyrocket, our major donor investments are climbing, and Democrats are running scared of the fundraising prowess of President Trump,” said Steven Cheung, communications director for the Trump campaign.

Title: Here’s the list of 25 stocks available for trading in T+0 basis from March 28
Summary:
A day before the much-awaited T+0 settlement cycle – beta version for now -- kicks in, BSE has released the list of 25 stocks that will be available for trading and settlement in the T+0 mechanism.
Last week, capital markets regulator the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) stated in a circular that the new framework would be introduced for a limited set of 25 stocks and also a limited set of brokers.
“The significant evolution of technology, architecture and capacity of MIIs, presents opportunities for further advancing clearing and settlement timelines.
“A shortened settlement cycle will bring cost and time efficiency, transparency in charges to investors and strengthen risk management at clearing corporations and the overall securities market ecosystem,” it added.
The Sebi circular further stated that the MIIs will have to disseminate on a periodic basis, the list of brokers that are participating in the beta version of T+0 settlement cycle on their websites and also provide a fortnightly report on the progress of activities in the beta version of T+0 settlement cycle till further direction.
